name: ShootyBlocks
description:
Blast your way though the blocks to win! Drag to move your ship and shoot through as many blocks as you can to clear a path. Collect Powerups to help smash the blocks.

Blocks become more powerful with each level. How far can you get?

Easy to play, hard to master. Don’t forget to upgrade your ship!

Game features:

  • Free to play
  • Endless gameplay
  • Simple controls
  • No ads or microtransactions.
